content:
This chunk explains that while the DIRECT library is written in Python, additional C++ classes are available to support its modules within the panda3d.direct package. It clarifies that since the module is Python-based, it is not accessible to C++ programs and directs users to switch to the Python manual version for further details.

There are additional C++ classes to support these modules, which can be found in the panda3d.direct module.

python

direct

cpp

Since this module is written in Python, it is not available to C++ programs. To switch to the Python version of the manual, use the link in the sidebar.
